skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Proficient in React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and Tailwind, focusing on creating responsive and visually appealing user interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Skilled in Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and RESTful APIs, with experience in server-side development, database management, and backend architecture.

skills.title: UI & UX Designs
skills.description: Experienced in creating intuitive and visually appealing designs with proficiency in Adobe XD, Figma, wireframing, and user-centered design principles.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Proficient in Webflow for designing and developing responsive websites, integrating dynamic content, and implementing custom interactions with a focus on visual aesthetics and user experience.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: I created a modern portfolio website using ReactJS and CSS. It showcases my projects, skills, and achievements with an intuitive design and seamless user experience, reflecting my passion for web development and attention to detail.
